mapper.insert: insert into user(user_name,password, role, name,email, account_holder, department, manufacturer,province,city, area,company_id,company_name,create_time,last_login_time) values(#{userName}, #{password}, #{role}, #{name},#{email}, #{accountHolder}, #{department}, #{manufacturer},#{province},#{city},#{area}, #{companyId},#{companyName},#{createTime}, #{lastLoginTime})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_name = #{userName} and role = 1 and is_deleted = 0

SELECT a.user_name as userName, a.industry, IFNULL(a.business, '') business, a.url, a.province, IFNULL(c.areaName, '') provinceName, a.city, IFNULL(d.areaName, '') cityName, a.address, a.phone, a.person, IFNULL(a.email, '') email, IFNULL(a.company,'') company, IFNULL(a.position,'') position, IFNULL(b.industry_name, '') industryName, IFNULL(e.waf, 0) waf, IFNULL(e.app, 0) app, IFNULL(e.site, 0) site, IFNULL(e.expert, 0) expert FROM `user` a LEFT JOIN industry b ON a.industry = b.id LEFT JOIN area c ON a.province = c.areaCode LEFT JOIN area d ON a.city = d.areaCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b2.app, b2.expert, b2.site, b2.waf, b2.user_id FROM ( SELECT max(b1.id) id, b1.app, b1.expert, b1.site, b1.waf, b1.user_id FROM (SELECT user_id, max(create_time) createTime FROM safe_trial GROUP BY user_id) a1 LEFT JOIN safe_trial b1 ON a1.createTime = b1.create_time AND a1.user_id = b1.user_id WHERE b1.user_id=#{userId} group by b1.app, b1.expert, b1.site, b1.waf, b1.user_id ) a2 LEFT JOIN safe_trial b2 ON a2.id = b2.id) e ON a.id = e.user_id WHERE a.id=#{userId} and a.role=0 and is_deleted = 0
